abstractText: Several metrics are calculated that relate to the spatial extent of side channels.Total Side Channel Area is the total area of all qualifying (16-49% of flow) and non-qualifying (<16% of flow) side channels.Proportion of Side Channel Area to Reach Area isthe percent of the total reach area (wetted area plus non-qualifying side channels) that is side channels (qualifying and non-qualifying).Aerial Proportion of pools for qualifying side channels isthe percent of the area of qualifying channels that is slow/pool.
title: Side Channel Calculations v1.0
